name: v1.9.0
body:
![triple threat](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/titanfall/images/f/fb/TripleThreat.png/revision/latest?cb=20140318082652)


**Features:**
Allow titan loadouts to be modified in script through callbacks ([#316](https://github.com/R2Northstar/NorthstarMods/pull/316))
Log all clientcommands if `ns_should_log_all_clientcommands` is set ([#209](https://github.com/R2Northstar/NorthstarLauncher/pull/209))
Re-enable Triple Threat ([#402](https://github.com/R2Northstar/NorthstarMods/pull/402))

**Fixes:**
Fix instant respawn exploit and block other Portal 2 commands ([#204](https://github.com/R2Northstar/NorthstarLauncher/pull/204))
Fix rejection of legitimately-invalid UserCmds (fixes grapple issues) ([#203](https://github.com/R2Northstar/NorthstarLauncher/pull/203))
Stop crashing on death with 4+ batteries + better drop logic ([#366](https://github.com/R2Northstar/NorthstarMods/pull/366))
Gun Game: Fix potentially transferring score from leaving player to new joining player ([#290](https://github.com/R2Northstar/NorthstarMods/pull/290))
Attrition - fix AI sometimes not spawning ([#393](https://github.com/R2Northstar/NorthstarMods/pull/393))
Fixed custom rpaks being loaded more than once ([#202](https://github.com/R2Northstar/NorthstarLauncher/pull/202))
Switch IsValveMod back to use a EnablerHook ([#210](https://github.com/R2Northstar/NorthstarLauncher/pull/210))
Block developer squirrel functions ([#21](https://github.com/R2Northstar/NorthstarLauncher/pull/211))

**Cleanup:**
Use strtoull instead of strtoll for uint64s ([#198](https://github.com/R2Northstar/NorthstarLauncher/pull/198))
Move LZSS exploit segfault fix hook to ExploitFixes.cpp ([#195](https://github.com/R2Northstar/NorthstarLauncher/pull/195))
Change localisation in Northstar.Custom to UTF16-LE ([#390](https://github.com/R2Northstar/NorthstarMods/pull/390)) 
Somewhat better Marvins on Wargames and Deck using Navmeshes ([#323](https://github.com/R2Northstar/NorthstarMods/pull/323)) 



**Contributors:**
@ASpoonPlaysGames @BobTheBob9 @Dinorush @F1F7Y @GeckoEidechse @Interesting-exe @KittenPopo @RoyalBlue1 @taskinoz
